context: Hi!! Can you recommend me some movie?? I like movies like Seven (1995)
resp: Sure, actually The Dark Knight Rises (2012) is pretty similar villain-wise. Zodiac (2007) and Twisted (2004) are the same detective-like stories. I'd also recommend Shutter Island (2010)
